description: Overview of liquid crystalline phases, their elasticity, topology, and dynamics.
name: INTRO TO LIQUID CRYSTALS

values.comments:
Evaluators felt that this course was extremely useful and that skills gained from the course could be applied to other courses or research. Nearly all students expressed a desire for this course to be offered every year so that more students had the opportunity to take it. Dr. Kamien received excellent reviews from students, some of whom named this course as the best one they have taken at Penn.
*Note: More than 75% of students submitted written evaluations for this class
